body:
Comment 19: 
I was just refactoring some code and was surprised when some code similar to this
accidentally compiled:

$ cat return.go 
package main

func foo() int {
	{
		return 5
	}
}

func main() {
	println(foo())
}

$ go run return.go 
5

$  go version
go version weekly.2012-03-27 +ef432c94ce9c
